item.title: R for Absolute Beginners 7th Edition
item.description: Looking forward to the 7th edition of R for Absolute Beginners! Here’s the ad: https://www.ccmar.ualg.pt/r-7edition. You may find the tutorial here: Day 1 tutorial: https://rpubs.com/isabelduarte/r4ab2019-day1 Day 2 tutorial: https://rpubs.com/isabelduarte/r4ab2019-day2
